actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to further protect the outstanding scenic, natural, recreational, scientific, and historical values of the Rocky Mountain National Park by enlarging the Rocky Mountain National Park in the State of Colorado.
short_title: Rocky Mountain National Park Enlargement Act

summary.text: Rocky Mountain National Park Enlargement Act - Provides for the enlargement of the Rocky Mountain National Park as described in this Act. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire such lands as are required to complete the enlargement. Provides for the preservation of Park lands as a wilderness.

titles.title: Rocky Mountain National Park Enlargement Act

A bill to further protect the outstanding scenic, natural, recreational, scientific, and historical values of the Rocky Mountain National Park by enlarging the Rocky Mountain National Park in the State of Colorado.
